description: Erection of a single storey rear & side extension and creating a first floor to the existing bungalow.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: Unnumbered Site Location Plan, Drawing No 1, Drawing No 2, Design & Access Statement received 28 September 2023; Fire Strategy received 10 October 2023; Drawing No 3 Rev B, Drawing No 4 Rev B, Drawing No 5 Rev B, Drawing No 6 Rev B received 30 November 2023.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side elevations shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening below 1.7 metres above internal floor level. The windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than in accordance with the requirements of this condition.
Condition : 5 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the side elevations of the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 6 - The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary to the enjoyment of the house at the 'Site Address' described at the top of this decision letter and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling other than as described in the submitted application, nor used for business purposes and shall not have a separate external entrance.
